description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows USB Print Driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-21442), it is important to apply the following updates:

1. Identify the relevant build of Windows you are running.
2. Download and install the appropriate KB articles corresponding to your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: Install KB5035853. 
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: Install KB5035853.
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: Install KB5035854.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): Install KB5035845.
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64): Install KB5035845.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (32-bit): Install KB5035845.
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (32-bit): Install KB5035845.

**Details**:
- This vulnerability can be exploited to gain elevated privileges on affected systems when using the Windows USB print driver. 
- Ensure you follow the update process specified in the Microsoft Update Catalog links provided below for installation.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.

**Update Packages**:
- [Download KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
- [Download KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
- [Download KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are running a compatible version of Windows as per the details outlined.
- Administrative privileges are required to apply these updates.
